title: ELO Boosting
body:
Hello I know of a person who has two accounts, he gets a friend of much higher skill level log into his alt account and they duo queue in ranked. This other player is demolishing the other team and carrying his team 95% of games causing the main account to fly through the ranks.

Is this not the same as having someone log into your main account and rank you up?

I can't help but think back over how many games I've been on the receiving end of being absolutely destroyed by one player is NOT of the rank he is ranked at while languishing down the ranks unable to win games.

Opinions?

replies.body: And THIS is exactly what's wrong with this community.

As stupid as his point is, I imagine it is more common in B5 than anywhere else to beg/convince/bribe a friend to help you out a bit. Of course there are some that maybe have never played ranked before, got unlucky in placements, and genuinely don't belong in B5 but rather say S something and want to get boosted out of B5 so they have a shot. I've never been as low as B5 (B3 was my lowest at placement) but B3 was bad enough. As a supp main it's near impossible to carry (if you don't play soraka) so I had a friend help me up. Not saying you should get Diamonds to play in Bronze, but they can't just delete the duo experience, a lot of people would never touch ranked again.

Carrying like that is allowed, theres even posts about it on the forums (see below), what isnt allowed is logging into their account to boost them.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/3QGEowPx-willing-to-carry-any-girl-to-diamond-via-duo
Just report with a support ticket, I regularly report boosters/botters this way, it's pretty easy to spot an account that's being boosted.

riot has given 0 fks since the dawn of time

if more people leave then they will do something about!
